page.title: 14Bryn Dafydd Fawr Farm
page.content: Bryn Dafydd Fawr Farm is a tenanted farm.It is owned by the family of Sir John Llewellyn,the largest land owner in our area.He once owned the Blaen-y-maes area,until the council bought the land off him to build a housing estate. The farm is now run by Mr.D.M.Thomas and his two brothers.They were brought up on the farm.His family has run it since the middle of the last century. The farm covers 300 acres of land. It is a mixed dairy and a beef farm with its main crop being grass which is stored as silage.It also produces a small crop of potatoes.The farm has a herd of a 150 Freisian cows.The E.E.C.milk quota will only allow the owner to produce 400 gallons per day and he is not allowed to keep any for himself.
